notFound.title: Brand not found
notFound.description: The brand you are looking for is not available yet.

featured.label: Featured collections

title.bassari: ESSENCES DU NIL & LE VOYAGE DES WOLOF
title.flamenco: INDIENNE STRIPES & PALACIO DE LAS DUEÑAS

featured.subtitle: Inside each tab you will find the collection presentation and its product carousel.

panel.title: Collections with character.
panel.description: Each texture is designed to stand out in interior projects that seek emotion, luxury, and a recognizable identity.

cta.title: Designs that sell experiences.
cta.description: Boost sales with collections that feel exclusive. Each line is crafted to create immersive, memorable atmospheres.

essences.title: NEW COLLECTION ESSENCES DU NIL
essences.description: Fresh, sophisticated textiles that evoke serenity and elegance, inspired by the light and rhythm of the Nile.

voyage.title: NEW COLLECTION LE VOYAGE DES WOLOF
voyage.description: A collection that blends tradition and modernity with authentic textures and natural tones for character-rich spaces.

indienne.title: NEW COLLECTION INDIENNE STRIPES
indienne.description: A vibrant striped proposal with artisanal inspiration, ideal for interiors full of energy and personality.

palacio.title: NEW COLLECTION PALACIO DE LAS DUEÑAS
palacio.description: Rich, elegant textures that evoke classic Sevillian charm with a contemporary touch.

bassari.name: Bassari
bassari.intro: Each collection captures the rhythm of the land, the warmth of natural pigments, and the authenticity of tradition.
bassari.highlight: Contemporary ethnic designs, enveloping tactility, and a palette that celebrates nature.

flamenco.name: Flamenco
flamenco.intro: Collections that combine craftsmanship and sophistication, with fabrics that elevate any space.
flamenco.highlight: Refined designs, luminous colors, and a sense of contemporary luxury.
